scripts.dev-compile:css: sass scss/style.scss css/style.css --style expanded --watch | postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'last 10 versions' css/style.css -o css/style.css
scripts.pro-compile:css: sass scss/style.scss css/style.css --style compressed | postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'last 10 versions' css/style.css -o css/style.css
